trans-unit.source: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a data source.
trans-unit.target: 表示要对数据源执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for database-specific classes that represent commands.
trans-unit.target: 提供表示命令的数据库特定类的基类。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 构造 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> 对象的实例。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to cancels the execution of a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 尝试取消 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> 的执行。

trans-unit.source: If there is nothing to cancel, nothing happens.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有要取消的内容，不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果有正在执行的命令，则即使取消尝试失败，也不会生成异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text command to run against the data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对数据源运行的文本命令。

trans-unit.source: The text command to execute.
trans-unit.target: 要执行的文本命令。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Data.CommandType> to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A> property to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.Data.CommandType>到`StoredProcedure`，应设置<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>到存储过程的名称的属性。

trans-unit.source: The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the `Execute` methods.
trans-unit.target: 当你调用之一时，该命令将执行此存储的过程`Execute`方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating the attempt to execute a command and generating an error.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在终止尝试执行命令并生成错误之前的等待时间。

trans-unit.source: The time in seconds to wait for the command to execute.
trans-unit.target: 等待命令执行所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArgumentException> is generated if the assigned <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> property value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArgumentException>如果生成分配<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>属性值小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Note to implementers, it is recommended that 0 means no timeout.
trans-unit.target: 注意： 此于实施者，建议 0 表示无超时。

trans-unit.source: Indicates or specifies how the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> property is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 指示或指定解释 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> 属性的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Text" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Text" />。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Data.CommandType> to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A> property to the name of the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.Data.CommandType>到`StoredProcedure`，应设置<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>到存储过程的名称的属性。

trans-unit.source: The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the `Execute` methods.
trans-unit.target: 当你调用之一时，该命令将执行此存储的过程`Execute`方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> used by this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> 使用的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: The connection to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 与数据源的连接。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" /> 对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" /> 对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> used by this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> 使用的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: The connection to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 与数据源的连接。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: SQL 语句或存储过程的参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.DbTransaction" /> within which this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> object executes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将在其中执行此 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.DbTransaction" />。

trans-unit.source: The transaction within which a Command object of a .NET Framework data provider executes.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中执行 .NET Framework 数据提供程序的 Command 对象的事务。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the command object should be visible in a customized interface control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此命令对象在自定义界面控件中是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the command object should be visible in a control; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该命令对象应在控件中可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Executes the command text against the connection.
trans-unit.target: 对连接执行命令文本。

trans-unit.source: A task representing the operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示该操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令文本时出现的一个错误。

trans-unit.source: An invalid <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 无效的 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Options for statement execution and data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: 语句执行和数据检索的选项。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要监视取消请求的标记。

trans-unit.source: Providers should implement this method to provide a non-default implementation for <see cref="Overload:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader" /> overloads.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序应执行该方法对 <see cref="Overload:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader" /> 重载提供非默认的实现。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation invokes the synchronous <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader" /> method and returns a completed task, blocking the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现调用同步 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader" /> 方法并返回已完成任务，以便阻止调用线程。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递到已取消的取消标记，则默认实现将返回已取消的任务。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions thrown by ExecuteReader will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property.
trans-unit.target: ExecuteReader 引发的异常将通过返回的任务异常属性传递。

trans-unit.source: This method accepts a cancellation token that can be used to request the operation to be cancelled early.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可用于请求操作之前接受取消标记。

trans-unit.source: Implementations may ignore this request.
trans-unit.target: 实现可能会忽略该请求。

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令文本时出现的一个错误。

trans-unit.source: An invalid <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 无效的 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Executes a SQL statement against a connection object.
trans-unit.target: 对连接对象执行 SQL 语句。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: 受影响的行数。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables), or to change the data in a database by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>执行目录操作 （例如，查询数据库的结构或创建数据库对象，如表），或通过执行更新、 插入或删除语句更改数据库中的数据。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>不会返回任何行，任何输出参数或返回值映射到参数填充了数据。

trans-unit.source: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.
trans-unit.target: 对于 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 语句，返回值为该命令所影响的行数。

trans-unit.source: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.
trans-unit.target: 对于其他所有类型的语句，返回值为 -1。

trans-unit.source: This method implements the asynchronous version of <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery" />, but returns a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> synchronously, blocking the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 此方法实现 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery" /> 的异步版本，但阻塞调用线程时同步返回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous version of <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery" />, which executes a SQL statement against a connection object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery" />的异步版本，针对一个连接对象执行一个 SQL 声明。

trans-unit.source: Invokes <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQueryAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> with CancellationToken.None.
trans-unit.target: 通过 CancellationToken.None 调用 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQueryAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)" />。

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令文本时出现的一个错误。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要监视取消请求的标记。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery" />.
trans-unit.target: 这是 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery" /> 的异步版本。

trans-unit.source: Providers should override with an appropriate implementation.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序应使用合适的实现进行重写。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token may optionally be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 可选择性忽略取消标记。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation invokes the synchronous <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery" /> method and returns a completed task, blocking the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现调用同步 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery" /> 方法并返回已完成任务，以便阻止调用线程。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递到已取消的取消标记，则默认实现将返回已取消的任务。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions thrown by <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery" /> will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery" /> 引发的异常将通过任务异常属性传递。

trans-unit.source: Do not invoke other methods and properties of the <see langword="DbCommand" /> object until the returned Task is complete.
trans-unit.target: 在返回的任务完成前，不要调用 <see langword="DbCommand" /> 对象的其他方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令文本时出现的一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> against the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection" /> and returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 针对 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> 执行 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection" />，并返回 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> against the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection" />, and returns an <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 针对 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> 执行 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection" />，并返回 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> against the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection" />, and returns an <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> using one of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 针对 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> 执行 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection" />，并使用 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> 值之一返回 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous version of <see cref="Overload:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader" />, which executes the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> against the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection" /> and returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader" /> 的异步版本，针对 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection" /> 执行 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Managed provider implementers must call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync%2A> in <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReaderAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 托管提供程序实施者必须调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync%2A>中<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReaderAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous version of <see cref="Overload:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader" />, which executes the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> against the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection" /> and returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader" /> 的异步版本，针对 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection" /> 执行 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Invokes <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync(System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> with CancellationToken.None.
trans-unit.target: 通过 CancellationToken.None 调用 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync(System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" />。

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: Managed provider implementers must call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync%2A> in <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReaderAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 托管提供程序实施者必须调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync%2A>中<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReaderAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令文本时出现的一个错误。

trans-unit.source: An invalid <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 无效的 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous version of <see cref="Overload:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader" />, which executes the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> against the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection" /> and returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader" /> 的异步版本，针对 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection" /> 执行 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Invokes <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync(System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync(System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" />.

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: Managed provider implementers must call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync%2A> in <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReaderAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 托管提供程序实施者必须调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync%2A>中<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReaderAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令文本时出现的一个错误。

trans-unit.source: An invalid <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 无效的 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要监视取消请求的标记。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous version of <see cref="Overload:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader" />, which executes the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> against the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection" /> and returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader" /> 的异步版本，针对 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection" /> 执行 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: This method propagates a notification that operations should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 此方法传播有关应取消操作的通知。

trans-unit.source: Invokes <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync(System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync(System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" />.

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: Managed provider implementers must call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync%2A> in <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReaderAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 托管提供程序实施者必须调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync%2A>中<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReaderAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令文本时出现的一个错误。

trans-unit.source: An invalid <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 无效的 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要监视取消请求的标记。

trans-unit.source: Invokes <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync(System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync(System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" />.

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: Managed provider implementers must call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync%2A> in <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReaderAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 托管提供程序实施者必须调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteDbDataReaderAsync%2A>中<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReaderAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令文本时出现的一个错误。

trans-unit.source: An invalid <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 无效的 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Executes the query and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.
trans-unit.target: 执行查询，并返回查询所返回的结果集中第一行的第一列。

trans-unit.source: All other columns and rows are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他的列和行将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The first column of the first row in the result set.
trans-unit.target: 结果集中第一行的第一列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A> method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A>方法以从数据库中检索单个值 （例如，一个聚合值）。

trans-unit.source: This requires less code than using the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> method and performing the operations necessary to generate the single value using the data returned by a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>.
trans-unit.target: 这要求更少的代码比使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>方法并执行生成使用返回的数据的单个值所需的操作<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>。

trans-unit.source: If the first column of the first row in the result set is not found, a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果结果集中的第一行的第一列未找到，空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 返回。

trans-unit.source: If the value in the database is `null`, the query returns `DBNull.Value`.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库中的值是`null`，该查询将返回`DBNull.Value`。

trans-unit.source: Implements the asynchronous version of <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteScalar" />, but returns a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> synchronously, blocking the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 实现一个 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteScalar" /> 的异步版本，但阻塞调用线程时同步返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous version of <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteScalar" />, which executes the query and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteScalar" /> 的异步版本，执行查询，并将查询返回的结果集中第一行的第一列返回。

trans-unit.source: All other columns and rows are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他的列和行将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Invokes <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteScalarAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> with CancellationToken.None.
trans-unit.target: 通过 CancellationToken.None 调用 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteScalarAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)" />。

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令文本时出现的一个错误。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要监视取消请求的标记。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteScalar" />.
trans-unit.target: 这是 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteScalar" /> 的异步版本。

trans-unit.source: Providers should override with an appropriate implementation.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序应使用合适的实现进行重写。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token may optionally be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 可选择性忽略取消标记。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation invokes the synchronous <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteScalar" /> method and returns a completed task, blocking the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现调用同步 <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.ExecuteScalar" /> 方法并返回已完成任务，以便阻止调用线程。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递到已取消的取消标记，则默认实现将返回已取消的任务。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions thrown by ExecuteScalar will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property.
trans-unit.target: ExecuteScalar 引发的异常将通过返回的任务异常属性传递。

trans-unit.source: Do not invoke other methods and properties of the <see langword="DbCommand" /> object until the returned Task is complete.
trans-unit.target: 在返回的任务完成前，不要调用 <see langword="DbCommand" /> 对象的其他方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 执行命令文本时出现的一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbParameter" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information on parameters, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关参数的详细信息，请参阅[配置参数和参数数据类型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: SQL 语句或存储过程的参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在数据源上创建准备就绪（或已编译）的命令版本。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandType%2A> property is set to `TableDirect`, `Prepare` does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandType%2A>属性设置为`TableDirect`，`Prepare`不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandType%2A> is set to `StoredProcedure`, the call to `Prepare` should succeed, although it may result in a no-op.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandType%2A>设置为`StoredProcedure`，调用`Prepare`应该会成功，虽然这可能会不导致不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbConnection" /> used by this instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> 的此实例使用的 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: The connection to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 与数据源的连接。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.Connection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.Connection%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of an <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbDataParameter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbDataParameter" /> 对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="IDbDataParameter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="IDbDataParameter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.CreateParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.CreateParameter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbCommand.CommandText" /> against the <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbCommand.Connection" /> and builds an <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbCommand.Connection" /> 执行 <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbCommand.CommandText" /> 并生成 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbCommand.CommandText" /> against the <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbCommand.Connection" /> and builds an <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbCommand.Connection" /> 执行 <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbCommand.CommandText" /> 并生成 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbCommand.CommandText" /> against the <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbCommand.Connection" />, and builds an <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" /> using one of the <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbCommand.Connection" /> 执行 <see cref="P:System.Data.IDbCommand.CommandText" />，并使用 <see cref="T:System.Data.CommandBehavior" /> 值之一生成 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataParameterCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataParameterCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: SQL 语句或存储过程的参数。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.Parameters%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.Parameters%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.DbTransaction" /> within which this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> object executes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将在其中执行此 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.DbTransaction" />。

trans-unit.source: The transaction within which a <see langword="Command" /> object of a .NET Framework data provider executes.
trans-unit.target: 在其中执行 .NET Framework 数据提供程序的 <see langword="Command" /> 对象的事务。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.Transaction*>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.Transaction*>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> within which this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> object executes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将在其中执行此 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" />。

trans-unit.source: The transaction within which a <see langword="Command" /> object of a .NET Framework data provider executes.
trans-unit.target: 在其中执行 .NET Framework 数据提供程序的 <see langword="Command" /> 对象的事务。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how command results are applied to the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> when used by the Update method of a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置命令结果在由 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> 的 Update 方法使用时如何应用于 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.UpdateRowSource" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.UpdateRowSource" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Both" /> unless the command is automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: 除非自动生成该命令，否则默认值为 <see langword="Both" />。

trans-unit.source: Then the default is <see langword="None" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果自动生成该命令，默认值为 <see langword="None" />。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.ArgumentException> if the value entered was not one of the <xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource> values.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果输入的值不是之一<xref:System.Data.UpdateRowSource>值。
